explanation: [0-0] A man wearing a burgundy T-shirt and jeans is walking in the living room. The living room is furnished with a gray carpet, picture frames on the white walls, beige pillows piled on the same color sofa, and a table lamp on a brown wooden table.
[0-5] The man takes a few steps forward, suddenly stops, turns back and quickly lies down next to the sofa, then lifts the top of the sofa, crawls underneath and disappears from the picture.
